label: 座主
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the monastic director (abbot) at Enryakuji on Mount Hiei; and sometimes the monastic director for temples of the Shingon school, such as the Kongôbuji temple-monastery complex on Mount Kôya in Kii Province. [金剛峰寺]
